scripts.build:dev: dotenv -e .env.dev -- docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_DASHBOARD_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_IOS_DOWNLOAD_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_DOWNLOAD_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY --label version=latest -t ghcr.io/ctrl-luma/lumapos-web:dev --push .
scripts.build:prod: dotenv -e .env.prod -- docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_DASHBOARD_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_IOS_DOWNLOAD_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_DOWNLOAD_URL --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY --label version=latest -t ghcr.io/ctrl-luma/lumapos-web:latest --push .
